org.gridgain.grid.spi.cloud
Interface GridCloudSpiListener

public interface GridCloudSpiListener

Cloud listener allows SPI to "communicate" with cloud manager. Cloud manager manages multiple cloud SPI instances as well as "implement" coordinator logic.

Wiki & Forum:


Wiki
Forum

 

Method Summary
 void onChange(GridCloudSpiSnapshot snapshot)
          Callback on change in the cloud state.
 void onCommand(boolean success, UUID cmdExecId, GridCloudCommand cmd, String msg)
          Callback on completed cloud command.
 

Method Detail

onChange

void onChange(GridCloudSpiSnapshot snapshot)
Callback on change in the cloud state.

Parameters:
snapshot - Cloud state snapshot that represents the current (changed) state of the cloud.

onCommand

void onCommand(boolean success,
               UUID cmdExecId,
               GridCloudCommand cmd,
               @Nullable
               String msg)
Callback on completed cloud command.

Parameters:
success - Whether or not command completed successfully.
cmdExecId - Command execution ID.
cmd - Command itself.
msg - Optional message provided by cloud provider for this command. In case of command failure this could be the error message.
